# Epanet Toolkit Wrapper for Python
https://www.epa.gov/water-research/epanet

# Source

Adapted from https://github.com/USEPA/WNTR and others

## Install

```console
> pip install entoolkit
```
## Load module

```python
from entoolkit import toolkit as et
```

## Help
https://www.epa.gov/water-research/epanet
